data.expected_result: TTS will not come from a channel if it has not been age confirmed or has been muted.
data.short_description: TTS plays from NSFW channels that have not been age-confirmed
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Change TTS settings to "For all channels" - Step 2: Join a channel that has a NSFW group, but do not age confirm it - Step 3: have people talk in that group. -
